entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Harbour 8:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

Temperature: 4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h except southeast 40 gusting to 60 near Haro Strait overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except west 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
